name: MUSIC IS FOR EVERYONE
description:
MUSIC IS FOR EVERYONE is a 4-player music improvisation game, played with gamepads.

Each player gets an instrument and you make music together. Players can also trigger actions to guide the direction of the improvisation, such as swapping instruments with another player or forcing one of the players to play a 2-bar solo, etc.

Play with the cat synthesizer! Go FULL SHOEGAZE! Force your friend to play a bass solo! Listen to your partners and have fun!

NOTE: This game is designed to be played with gamepads (xbox 360 preferred). It can be played with fewer than 4 players, but it's not as much fun. It cannot be played on a keyboard.
